ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and nubile maidens of similar age,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And graceful maidens of the same age,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and youthful maidens of like age,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: maidens with pears-shaped breasts who are of equal age (to their spouses)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And maidens of a single age.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And voluptuous women of equal age;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and maidens with swelling breasts, like of age,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And voluptuous women of equal age;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and young maidens of equal age,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And full-breasted maidens of equal age.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and buxom maidens of a like age,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And voluptuous women of equal age;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And young full-breasted (mature) maidens of equal age;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [78:33] and buxom maidens (kawā‘ib is the plural of kā‘ib) of equal age (atrāb is the plural of tirb),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: And maidens for companions) who are all of the same age: 33 years of age,
